item.title: Publications
item.description: Talks and workshops OLA Superconference 2018 Disaster recovery in a box: Planning to save your collections in an emergency. Speakers: Donna Marie MacLeod, Wendy McPhee, Tessa Thomas When: Friday, Feb 02 | 9:50 am - 10:30 am Profile Session Presentation: Disaster Recovery in a box Form: Branch collection Form: Initial damage assessment Inventory: Inventory disaster plan - spreadsheet Sir Sanford Fleming college Every year for the past few years, I have done a guest lecture for the Preservation of Books, Photos and Archival Materials course (SCIE0047) in Fleming Collegeâ€™s Cultural Heritage Conservation and Management program, (session instructor Laura Cunningham).
